title: EventSubscription
description: This schema defines the EventSubscription entity. An Event Subscription has trigger, filters and Subscription

status.description: Status is `disabled`, when event Subscription was created with `enabled` set to false and it never started publishing events. Status is `active` when eventSubscription is normally functioning and 200 OK response was received for callback notification. Status is `failed` on bad callback URL, connection failures, `1xx`, and `3xx` response was received for callback notification. Status is `awaitingRetry` when previous attempt at callback timed out or received `4xx`, `5xx` response. Status is `retryLimitReached` after all retries fail.

lastSuccessfulAt.description: Last non-successful callback time in UNIX UTC epoch time in milliseconds.

lastFailedAt.description: Last non-successful callback time in UNIX UTC epoch time in milliseconds.

lastFailedStatusCode.description: Last non-successful activity response code received during callback.

lastFailedReason.description: Last non-successful activity response reason received during callback.

nextAttempt.description: Next retry will be done at this time in Unix epoch time milliseconds. Only valid is `status` is `awaitingRetry`.

resources.description: Defines a list of resources that triggers the Event Subscription, Eg All, User, Teams etc.

rules.description: A set of filter rules associated with the Alert.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies this Event Subscription.

name.description: Name that uniquely identifies this Event Subscription.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Name that uniquely identifies a Event Subscription.

displayName.description: Display name for this Event Subscription.

description.description: A short description of the Event Subscription, comprehensible to regular users.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

version.description: Metadata version of the Event Subscription.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the Event Subscription in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

changeDescription.description: Change that led to this version of the Event Subscription.

filteringRules.description: Set of rules that the Event Subscription Contains to allow conditional control for alerting.

batchSize.description: Maximum number of events sent in a batch (Default 10).

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
